alert.note: Alert for Kofa; Parker Valley; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 7:29PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern La Paz, northwestern Yuma, eastern Imperial and Riverside Counties through 815 PM MST/815 PM PDT/... At 728 PM MST/728 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 24 miles northeast of Brawley to 9 miles north of Algodones Dunes to 8 miles north of Winterhaven. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Martinez Lake, Cibola, Palo Verde, Yuma Proving Ground and Glamis. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 95 between mile markers 63 and 74. CA Route 78 between mile markers 35 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
